text: Medical science has proven time and again that when the resources are provided, great progress in the treatment, cure, and prevention of disease can occur.
author: Michael J. Fox

text: It seems sensible to me that we should look to the medical profession, that over the centuries has helped us to live longer and healthier lives, to help us die peacefully among our loved ones in our own home without a long stay in God's waiting room.
author: Terry Pratchett

text: I believe it should be possible for someone stricken with a serious and ultimately fatal illness to choose to die peacefully with medical help, rather than suffer.
author: Terry Pratchett

text: Finish last in your league and they call you idiot. Finish last in medical school and they call you doctor.
author: Abe Lemons

text: A retired teacher paid $62,000 towards her pension and nothing, yes nothing, for full family medical, dental and vision coverage over her entire career. What will we pay her? $1.4 million in pension benefits and another $215,000 in health care benefit premiums over her lifetime.
author: Chris Christie
